alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:23AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern DeSoto, eastern Tunica and Tate Counties through 545 AM CST... At 522 AM CST, a strong thunderstorm was reported near Little Texas, or 16 miles west of Senatobia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Tunica Airport reported a gust of 40 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hernando, Senatobia, Coldwater, Barr, Phillipp, Strayhorn, Eudora, Independence, Lewisburg, Arkabutla, Robinsonville, Little Texas, Wakefield, Trinity, Cockrum, Savage, Frees Corners, Aiken, Crossroad and Bright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northwestern Mississippi.
